description:
■About the Game
Eat your Moon-gazing Dumpling anywhere!
Choose whatever view you like,
but the game ends after your snack!
Head for dizzying heights in your quest for the best spot!

■Story
One day, two of Rabbit's friends came to him.
They presented Rabbit with a lovely Moon-gazing Dumpling!
"Well, there's nothing to be done. I must simply find a nice, high spot to enjoy such a treat!"

Rabbit is always having a good time jumping everywhere, especially when there's food to enjoy too!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series Moon Viewing Jump Rabbit
